Detailed Description

This class implements a standard dynamic chunk item.

void ChunkDynamicEmbodiment::enterSpace ( ChunkSpacePtr  pSpace,
bool  transient 
) [virtual]

Enter the given space.

Transient is set to true if switching spaces.

Implements ChunkEmbodiment.

Reimplemented in ChunkAttachment, and ChunkDynamicObstacle.

Leave the current space.

Transient is set to true if switching spaces.

void ChunkDynamicEmbodiment::move ( float  dTime  )  [virtual]

If we move but have no chunk then try to find one.

Derived classes should call this method _after_ they move.

Implements ChunkEmbodiment.

Reimplemented in ChunkAttachment, and ChunkDynamicObstacle.

void ChunkDynamicEmbodiment::nest ( ChunkSpace *  pSpace  )  [virtual]

See if we would prefer to settle down in a smaller chunk.

Reimplemented from ChunkItemBase.

void ChunkDynamicEmbodiment::sync (  ) 

This method updates the chunk that we are in when the matrix for this embodiment changes.

It is up to derived classes to call this method when necessary. It must not be called when the space is missing or ticking! If you need to change the matrix then, then you have to save it somewhere and pass it to us from the next move call.
